content: तिरस्कृ(तिरः --कृ) {c8c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To despise, contemn; <ls>H. 3. 8</ls>, <ls>Bk. 9. 62.</ls> {@--2@} To blame, scold, abuse; गीभिर्गुरूणां परुषाक्षराभिस्तिरस्कृता यांति नरा महत्त्वं <ls>Bv. 1. 73.</ls> {@--3@} To surpass, excel; <ls>R. 3. 8.</ls> {@--4@} To cover, conceal; <ls>R. 16. 20</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 49</ls>, <ls>Amaru. 81.</ls> {@--5@} To set aside, remove.
